wikipedia_page.main: Lewis Roberts (born 2 July 1985) is an English professional snooker player. He became a professional in 2008, however he did not retain his place on the tour at the end of the 2008–09 season.

response: * Lewis Roberts (snooker player) (born 1985), English snooker player
* Lewis Roberts (naturalist) (born 1950), naturalist and botanical illustrator
